text:
@BorisJohnson Seen too many tik tok's to clap. The one where nurses had a "dead" body on their shoulders with covid19 written on it was the last straw. 

YOUR expert & his model, due to which we are in this lockdown, didn't care about the rules imposed, thus proving this is a load of rubbish
